question_name.english: Identify the electrical component shown in the diagram:

image: <svg width='300' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect x='100' y='40' width='100' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='140' y='30'>?</text></svg>

question_name.english: What type of electrical meter is shown?
question_name.hindi: किस प्रकार का विद्युत मीटर दर्शाया गया है?

image: <svg width='300' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='150' cy='50' r='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='145' y='55'>A</text></svg>

question_name.english: Which type of fuse symbol is this?
question_name.hindi: यह किस प्रकार का फ्यूज प्रतीक है?

image: <svg width='300' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='100' y1='50' x2='200' y2='50' stroke='black'/><line x1='130' y1='50' x2='170' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/></svg>

question_name.english: What does this combination of symbols represent?
question_name.hindi: प्रतीकों का यह संयोजन क्या दर्शाता है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect x='100' y='30' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><rect x='100' y='80' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='30' x2='50' y2='100' stroke='black'/><line x1='250' y1='30' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='black'/></svg>

question_name.english: Identify the type of switch shown:
question_name.hindi: दर्शाए गए स्विच के प्रकार की पहचान करें:

image: <svg width='300' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='100' y1='50' x2='150' y2='30' stroke='black'/><circle cx='100' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'/><circle cx='180' cy='30' r='3' fill='black'/><circle cx='180' cy='70' r='3' fill='black'/></svg>

question_name.english: What type of bulb connection is shown in the diagram?
question_name.hindi: चित्र में किस प्रकार का बल्ब कनेक्शन दर्शाया गया है?

image: <svg width='300' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='100' cy='50' r='15' fill='none' stroke='black'/><circle cx='200' cy='50' r='15' fill='none' stroke='black'/><line x1='50' y1='50' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='black'/><text x='95' y='55'>×</text><text x='195' y='55'>×</text></svg>

question_name.english: Which electrical component is connected incorrectly?
question_name.hindi: कौन सा विद्युत घटक गलत जुड़ा है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect x='120' y='50' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><circle cx='200' cy='60' r='15' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='195' y='65'>V</text><line x1='200' y1='45' x2='200' y2='75' stroke='black'/></svg>

question_name.english: What does this heating element symbol represent?
question_name.hindi: यह तापन तत्व प्रतीक क्या दर्शाता है?

image: <svg width='300' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M 100 50 Q 150 30 200 50' fill='none' stroke='black'/><path d='M 100 60 Q 150 80 200 60' fill='none' stroke='black'/></svg>

question_name.hindi: अर्थ कनेक्शन प्रतीक की पहचान करें:

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='50' y1='30' x2='50' y2='70' stroke='black'/><line x1='30' y1='70' x2='70' y2='70' stroke='black'/><line x1='35' y1='80' x2='65' y2='80' stroke='black'/><line x1='40' y1='90' x2='60' y2='90' stroke='black'/><text x='40' y='110'>C</text></svg>

question_name.english: What type of meter connection is shown for measuring high voltage?
question_name.hindi: उच्च वोल्टेज मापने के लिए किस प्रकार का मीटर कनेक्शन दर्शाया गया है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='150' cy='60' r='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='145' y='65'>V</text><rect x='200' y='50' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='black'/><text x='210' y='65'>R</text></svg>
